scripts.electron: ((cd electron; npx electron-packager . --overwrite --platform=mas); npm run copy-bins-prod)
scripts.package:publish: npm run build; npm publish --access public;
scripts.copy-bins-dev: (cd electron; mkdir resources/bin; (export A=$(type node); export B=${A#"node is"}; cp $B ./resources/bin/node); (export A=$(type npm); export B=${A#"npm is"}; cp $B ./resources/bin/npm))
scripts.copy-bins-prod: (cd electron; mkdir Deep.Case-darwin-x64/Deep.Case.app/Contents/Resources/app/resources/bin; (export A=$(type node); export B=${A#"node is"}; cp $B ./Deep.Case-darwin-x64/Deep.Case.app/Contents/Resources/app/resources/bin/node); (export A=$(type npm); export B=${A#"npm is"}; cp $B ./Deep.Case-darwin-x64/Deep.Case.app/Contents/Resources/app/resources/bin/npm))
